FuncDef:
The drop-profile command creates a WRED drop profile and enters the WRED drop profile view, or enters the existing WRED drop profile view.
The undo drop-profile command deletes a WRED drop profile. The drop-profile command creates a WRED drop profile and enters the WRED drop profile view, or enters the existing WRED drop profile view. The undo drop-profile command deletes a WRED drop profile. By default, the system provides a WRED drop profile named default.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a WRED drop profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces or question marks (?). It cannot be b, br, bri, brie, or brief.

ExtraInfo: A WRED drop profile defines WRED parameters for packets of different priorities. After the WRED drop profile is applied to an interface or queues on an interface, congestion avoidance is implemented. The drop-profile command creates a WRED drop profile or enters the WRED drop profile view.
